name: Token Vendor for WooCommerce
author: nora0123456789

sections.description: Enables to generate token as product, which can be validated by the WC shop while it is valid and is not expired.
sections.installation:
1. upload to “/wp-content/plugins/token-vendor-for-woocommerce”, or directly search and install from wp repository on your admin page. ( “Plugins” -> “Add New” )
  2. Activate.
sections.faq:
How to use

How-to page is prepared in admin page “WooCommerce” -> “NTVWC”. Please regard.

What this plugin for?

Enable WooCommerce to sell token to be validate.
